lead_paragraph: Tyler Hamilton, who is serving a two-year suspension for doping, won the only race he has been free to ride, the 7.6-mile Mt. Washington Auto Road Bicycle Hillclimb in New Hampshire, reaching the summit in 52 minutes 21 seconds. Hamilton’s suspension ends Sept. 22, and the World Cycling Championships begin Sept. 24.
